1000011100101011 0111100111100011 0 -> sum: 0000000100001110, cout: 1
1011101010010111 0000101111110110 0 -> sum: 1100011010001101, cout: 0
0000001000100010 1110100100000000 0 -> sum: 1110101100100010, cout: 0
0101101001100000 0001001010101110 0 -> sum: 0110110100001110, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
